item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! I’m Thang Pham, aka aome. I’m currently a third-year student at University of Waterloo studying Computer Science. My current fields of interest are robotics and automation. I love building software and tinkering with cool tech. I believe that seeing what you built recognized and well-received by others is the best feeling when programming. In my free time, I read tech news and blog posts, listen to music, and read books.

item.title: TIL
item.description: My own collection of tech-related TILs
